data.eml:eml: A new species of Longtania Ding from China and redescription of the male genitalia of Platytibia ferruginea Ding (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Delphacidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Qin, Dao-Zheng, Zhang, Ya-Lin (2009): A new species of Longtania Ding from China and redescription of the male genitalia of Platytibia ferruginea Ding (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Delphacidae). Zootaxa 1979: 62-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185232
